timeline.message: Add some info and debug logging

timeline.body: Please add the instance to the log message. Nice to see the same hash go in and out.
timeline.bodyText: Please add the instance to the log message. Nice to see the same hash go in and out.
timeline.bodyHTML: Please add the instance to the log message. Nice to see the same hash go in and out.

replies.author: gjoranv

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
logger.log(LogLevel.DEBUG, () -> "Removing Telegraf instance from registry");
logger.log(LogLevel.DEBUG, () -> "Removing Telegraf instance from registry: " + telegraf);
